multiCat.title: 7 Ways to Control Multi-Cat Litter Odor
multiCat.description: Overwhelmed by multiple cat litter box smell? These 7 proven methods eliminate even the strongest multi-cat ammonia odors. Stop dreading coming home to that awful stink!

odorAbsorber.title: Most Powerful Odor Absorber for Cat Litter: Science-Backed 2025 Guide
odorAbsorber.description: Discover the most powerful odor absorber strategies for cat litter boxes. Compare activated carbon, zeolite, and hybrid systems so your home may stay fresh without harsh perfumes.

stats.title: Odor Elimination Benchmarks
stats.ammoniaReduction: Independent lab data shows up to 92% ammonia reduction with activated carbon layers
stats.adsorptionSpeed: Porous carbon structure traps odor molecules in under 60 seconds
stats.safeUsage: No chemicals, fragrances, or additives - non-toxic for sensitive cats
stats.refreshTiming: Refresh carbon every scoop or litter top-up for consistent performance

blogSection.description: Expert advice and tips for cat owners
